title: How do I change my payment date?
content:
Your billing date falls on or around the same day of the month you first started a Grammarly subscription. However, if you need to change your billing date, please follow these steps:
Cancel
your current billing cycle.
Start a new Grammarly subscription
on the day you’d like to be charged. Moving forward, you’ll be charged on or around that day each month.
Note:
You will need to use a Grammarly Free account until the date you’d like the new billing to start.
